# luccpy

## install
**luccpy** is available on [PyPI](https://pypi.org/user/lixuan/), so to install it, run this command in your terminal:

**With conda**
```bash
conda create -n luccpy_env 
conda activate luccpy_env 
pip install luccpy
```

**With uv**
```bash
uv venv
uv add luccpy
```
